description: Chronique de Normandie; Unknown; Paris, France; 1400 to 1415; Tempera colors and gold leaf on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with brown morocco; most miniatures executed in black and brown inks with a gray wash; Leaf: 29.1 × 19.1 cm (11 7/16 × 7 1/2 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIII 4; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
